US pushes for UN Security Council action to end war in SudanThe United States on Wednesday pushed for the United Nations Security Council to take action to help end a nearly year-long conflict in Sudan between the Sudanese army and the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF). Wed, 28 Feb 2024 20:26:09 GMT DRGKFHEN4BK5DAFPPISDJ7SJKE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/us-pushes-un-security-council-action-end-war-sudan-2024-02-28/Michelle Nichols世界非洲
Biden should make Iran pay a price for proxy attacks, says former Trump aideU.S. President Joe Biden should make Iran pay a direct price for attacks on U.S. forces by Iranian-backed proxies, the former top Iran official in the Trump administration said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 20:13:22 GMT 7LHK2XHEBJLQTOLRKLNOY7QXZM https://www.reuters.com/world/biden-should-make-iran-pay-price-proxy-attacks-says-former-trump-aide-2024-02-28/Arshad Mohammed世界
Brazil's Lula says he wants to resume diplomatic presence in Caribbean nationsPresident Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said on Wednesday he wanted Brazil to resume having a diplomatic presence in Caribbean countries. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 19:52:03 GMT CMHNPOIIC5PUXAGNIEDRNP3DEI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazils-lula-says-he-wants-resume-diplomatic-presence-caribbean-nations-2024-02-28/Reuters世界美洲
Helicopter goes missing off Norway, rescue service saysA helicopter went missing off the coast of western Norway on Wednesday after sending an emergency signal, and several people were later observed in the ocean nearby, the country's rescue service said. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 19:50:07 GMT GQZJORNCXZJ3XDPPRUUPOYPCT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/helicopter-goes-missing-off-norway-rescue-service-says-2024-02-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy thanks Serbian leader for supportUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy thanked Serbian President Aleksandar Vucic on Wednesday for his support in Kyiv's two-year-old war against Russia and pledged to work further on Kyiv's plan to end the conflict. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 19:37:58 GMT T6CLLA3C5NKMVECUUWELDXE4AU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-thanks-serbian-leader-support-2024-02-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Syrian air defences intercept Israeli strikes in vicinity of Damascus, state media saysSyrian air defences intercepted Israeli strikes in the vicinity of the capital Damascus, state media said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 19:31:32 GMT 4LBMXOTZXFN7ZLAHMKI3JLMMHI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/syrian-air-defences-intercept-israeli-strikes-vicinity-damascus-state-media-says-2024-02-28/Reuters世界中东
'Mob rule' replacing democracy in Britain, warns PM SunakBritain is descending into "mob rule" and police will do more to protect the country's democracy, Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said on Wednesday, after the government announced extra funding to keep lawmakers safe. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 19:24:17 GMT 4EVSOTUVNBKHJDIVVHHNCGZFPM https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/mob-rule-replacing-democracy-britain-warns-pm-sunak-2024-02-28/Reuters世界英国
Greek court charges 10 people over bomb and hand grenade attacksA Greek prosecutor charged 10 people on Wednesday over a series of recent bomb and hand grenade attacks, including a planned parcel bomb explosion at a court in the northern city of Thessaloniki this month, judicial sources said. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 18:51:13 GMT E7E44L64PZIMXA5264HABXUAC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/greek-court-charges-10-people-over-bomb-hand-grenade-attacks-2024-02-28/Reuters世界欧洲
Masked men in Gaza enforce prices in street marketsArmed, masked men in Gaza have started patrols to stop traders profiteering in Rafah, where more than a million displaced Palestinians are taking shelter from Israel's air and ground campaign, a member of the vigilante group said. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 18:21:43 GMT EKHCZJP73JNNDHC5DLQ3JIIBAE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/masked-men-gaza-enforce-prices-street-markets-2024-02-28/Reuters世界中东
Eight EU countries call for sanctions on Russian judiciary over Navalny's deathEight European Union countries called on Wednesday for sanctions on Russia's prosecutors, courts and penitentiary officials over the death earlier this month of Kremlin critic Alexei Navalny, a letter seen by Reuters showed. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 18:10:31 GMT B4NVXOKXNJNW5O3NXD3GCK532Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eight-eu-countries-call-sanctions- Russian-judiciary-over-navalnys-death-2024-02-28/Reuters世界欧洲
G7 finance meeting marred by divisions over seizing Russian assetsFrench Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire on Wednesday publicly challenged U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen's view that it would be legal to monetize some $300 billion in frozen Russian assets, revealing deep divisions among Group of Seven countries. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 17:46:52 GMT FCDAH2LCHFK2DHJACGSB66DNMY https://www.reuters.com/world/g7-finance-meeting-marred-by-divisions-over-seizing-Russian-assets-2024-02-28/Andrea Shalal, Christian Kraemer世界
